page.title: 10 AMUSEMENTS IN FOLKESTONE
page.content: As Folkestone is a holiday town amusements are very popular as tourist attractions. The weather cannot be trusted so indoor amusements are a good idea in all seasons. Most amusement arcades are situated near the harbour and sea front. These amusements are often behind shop fronts in small back streets. The arcades have bingo, one- armed bandits and many electronic games. These games usually cost 10p or 20p. There is also a large amusement park in Folkestone which is on the sea front. It is called the Rotunda. The main attractions are the bingo halls, the Cyclone which is a rollercoaster, and the Bounty which swings from side to side and you think you will fall out. You pay by a disc system. You get five discs for one pound and twelve discs for two pounds.
